turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu önemli işi yapmasam patronum beni azarlar.
english_example_sentence: If I were not to do this important work, my boss would scold me.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я не сделал эту важную работу, мой начальник бы меня ругал.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu önemli işi ______ patronum beni azarlar.
